bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of head, body and extremities swaying, and a perception of xuan yun 眩 運 , vertigo, affecting the head and the eyes. Su wen 素問 74: 諸風掉眩，皆屬於肝 , “All [diseases with] wind [causing] swaying and dizziness , without exception they are associated with the liver”. Diao yan 吊眼 , hauled eyes [1]

Illness Sign identical with shang shi 上視 , vision turned upward. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry dai zhe shi 代赭石 quotes Ren zhai zhi zhi fang 仁齋直指方 : 吊眼撮口，搐搦不定 , “ Hauled eyes , pursed mouth, and convulsions that cannot be stabilized”.
